```py
>>> a = np.arange(10)
>>> b = np.ones(20)
>>> np.who()
Name            Shape            Bytes            Type
===========================================================
a               10               80               int64
b               20               160              float64
Upper bound on total bytes  =       240 
```

```py
>>> d = {'x': np.arange(2.0), 'y': np.arange(3.0), 'txt': 'Some str',
... 'idx':5}
>>> np.who(d)
Name            Shape            Bytes            Type
===========================================================
x               2                16               float64
y               3                24               float64
Upper bound on total bytes  =       40 
```
